Darkfate:

"I'LL SKIN THIS MAXIMAL ALIVE FOR THISSSSSS!!!!!" Yelled anoyed 
Darkfate while he covered his eyes due the flash granade 

As soon as he could see he prepared his weapon against Angel Prime 
while he felt the gravity increase. His four snake-like heads, that 
are in his chest in robot mode, started moved and soon will be ready 
to shot their tiny laser guns.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest::
> 
> Killfest feels the gravity increase. He carefully lands on the 
ground 
> to avoid wasting jetpack fuel, and then runs off toward Angel Prime.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > ::Drag Strip::
> > Drag Strip gets blinded by the sudden unexpected flash, yells, 
> > "Argh, I don't think so Maximal," Still blinded he transforms 
into 
> > robot mode, and fires his gravity gun, creating a gravity field 
> which 
> > encompasses all of the bots present, increasing the gravity 
> greatly, 
> > "Now try to get a way!" (this artificial gravity affects all but 
> > stunticons)
